title: #EID_47597_RECSBox_PCIeDevice.v0_1_0

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Baseboard.description: The Baseboard hosting the PCIePort this PCIeDevice is attached to
Baseboard.longDescription: This object shall only contain a reference that complies to the Baseboard schema.

Backplane.description: A reference to the Backplane the Baseboard of this PCIeDevice is connected to.
Backplane.longDescription: This object shall only contain a reference that complies to the Backplane schema.

Links.description: Base type for an Oem object.
Links.longDescription: This object represents the base type for an Oem property.  All values for resources described by this schema shall comply to the requirements as described in the Redfish specification.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Port.description: The PCIePort this PCIeDevice is attached to
Port.longDescription: This object shall only contain a reference that complies to the Baseboard schema.

ComposedIn.description: This is a link to the ComposedNode, this PCIeDevice is composed in.
ComposedIn.longDescription: This object shall only contain a reference to a resource that comply to the ComposedNode schema.
